feed.section_title: Because you want 'Dream nursery set for my newborn from CuddleCo'

items.name: Neutral Stripe 'I Love My Daddy' Organic Cotton Sleepsuit

metadata.name: Neutral Stripe 'I Love My Daddy' Organic Cotton Sleepsuit
metadata.description:
For little ones who love to stretch out for a cuddle - there s nothing better than dreamy snuggles with mummy! And they are just a snooze away in this Organic Footed Sleepsuit. Ideal for welcoming them to the world, it s the perfect blend of comfort and charm that makes a lovely gift for both newborns and for new parents. Crafted from ultra-soft, breathable fabric, this sleepsuit is gentle on delicate skin, and the little giraffe appliqué adds an oh-so sweet touch with handy poppers for fastening. So whether you re preparing a hospital bag, shopping for a baby shower gift, or dressing your own bundle of joy, this sleepsuit brings together style, softness, and simplicity. • I love my mummy sleepsuit • Giraffe appliqué • Super soft touch • Peter Pan collar • Polka dot print • Poppers from top to bottom • Fold over scratch cuffs up to size 9-12 months • Sizes 9-12 months feature anti-slip dots on feet • KEEP AWAY FROM FIRE • Machine washable This product contains at least 95% certified organically grown cotton. Jo Jo are certified by Soil Association to a Chain of Custody standard which verifies the percentage of organically grown cotton and tracks it from source to final product.
Save £10.00* when buying 2 items from Jo Jo Maman Bebé Sleepsuits/Layette Range.* Saving applied will be apportioned across all qualifying items. To get the saving, you must order the qualifying items within the same order at the same time. If you later return one of the items, you will not be entitled to the discount. Offer applies to selected items at full price.  Please refer to T&Cs for full details. 100% Cotton.

payload.feed_reason: Similar to 'Dream nursery set for my newborn from CuddleCo'

metadata.name: Cuddleco White Nola Changing Table
metadata.description: The Nola White and Natural Changing Table has an airy yet compact design, perfect for small space, and modern living. This gender-neutral, white changing table is a stylish nursery must-have. The changing unit features a changing top with raised sides and 2 spacious shelves, ideal for storing nappy changing essentials.   Nola’s open design means you can easily grab a nappy, a clean sleepsuit or anything else you might need from one of the shelves below. Don’t forget to purchase a changing mat to keep your little one comfortable.  The changing top is suitable up until 11kg approx 12 months Changing mats are sold separately. The recommended changing mat size is 75 x 46cm Lay the mat on the top surface within the retaining barriers Features 2 spacious shelves Fully certified and accredited testing to BS EN 12221:2008+A1:2013 2-year warranty against manufacturing defects. The warranty period is effective from the day of purchase Self-assembly required Never use furniture polish to clean the furniture. Use a duster or damp cloth to remove stubborn stains. Always dry afterwards  Height 91cm Width 53cm Depth 81.5cm

payload.feed_reason: Similar to 'Dream nursery set for my newborn from CuddleCo'

metadata.name: CuddleCo White Clara Cot Bed
metadata.description:
Complete your fairy tale with the Clara furniture set. Classic curvature with a modern contemporary look, function and style to transform any nursery. Full-size cot bed suitable from birth to about 5 years 3 mattress positions Converts into a modern, stylish toddler bed Classic styling Designed for durability and long-term use Length 88cm Width 82cm Depth 156cm Multibuy: Save 10% when buying 2 or more items each priced at £150 or above across selected Sofas, Chairs, Rugs, Beds, Mattresses and Furniture Collections. Multibuy is only applicable to the UK Mainland Area.* Condition: * Saving applied will be apportioned across all qualifying items. To get the saving, you must order the qualifying items in the same order at the same time. If you later return one of the items, you will not be entitled to the discount. Offer applies to selected items at full price. Please refer to T&Cs for full details. This item will be delivered directly to you from our branded partner. Prior to delivery our partner or their carrier will contact you to confirm a date. Unfortunately weekend deliveries are currently unavailable.

Please note that delivery is unavailable outside the UK Mainland. This product requires self-assembly. Regrettably, self-assembly items cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed, unless they do not comply with the description given, are faulty, or are not fit for any stated purpose. Your statutory rights are not affected.

payload.feed_reason: Similar to 'Dream nursery set for my newborn from CuddleCo'

metadata.name: Cuddleco Natural Aria Crib Rattan
metadata.description: The Aria Crib is the perfect way to add a boho-chic feel to your nursery. This beautifully designed rattan crib combines traditional techniques with a modern style. Enhance your nursery with the warmth and texture of Aria. The Aria Crib comes with a crib liner and a mattress to ensure a safe sleeping environment for your baby. The mattress is breathable, soft and supportive, providing the ideal place for your new arrival to snooze and dream. The quilted fabric used on both mattress and liner is made with ultra-soft fibres which help to promote airflow and regulate temperature.Product Features: Suitable from birth until approximately 6 months old. The crib is not suitable for children who can sit or kneel or pull themselves up. The product shall not be used before reading the instructions for use. The Aria Crib comes with a liner and foam mattress included. The liner must be used with the crib. The Aria Crib measures 92 x 56 x 73cm (L x W x H). Fully and accredited testing to BS EN 1130:2019. Self assembly required. This product requires self-assembly. Wipe clean only. Regrettably, self-assembly items cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed, unless they do not comply with the description given, are faulty, or are not fit for any stated purpose. Your statutory rights are not affected.  This product requires self-assembly. Regrettably, self-assembly items cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed, unless they do not comply with the description given, are faulty, or are not fit for any stated purpose. Your statutory rights are not affected.

items.name: Cuddleco Natural Aria Wave Rattan Crib

metadata.name: Cuddleco Natural Aria Wave Rattan Crib
metadata.description: The Aria Wave Crib is a beautiful sleep time must-have for your new arrival, with a beautiful, intricate, handwoven design and soft curves. The natural rattan bassinet is supported by contemporary, sleek black legs and is lightweight enough to be easily transported around the house so your baby can snooze by your side, no matter which room you’re in. The Aria Wave Crib comes with a soft and supportive crib mattress featuring a hypoallergenic knitted cover with natural fibre for a clean sleep environment. Features: Comes with a crib mattress Suitable from birth to 6 months Not suitable for children who can sit, kneel, or pull themselves up Conforms to BS EN 1130: 2019 Self-assembly required 2-year warranty against manufacturing defects (effective from the day of purchase) Never use furniture polish; clean with a duster or damp cloth for stubborn stains Always dry afterwards Wipe clean with a soft cloth dampened in water and mild soapy solution, then wipe dry Natural materials may change colour and develop character over time Handmade with natural materials, so sizes and shapes may vary Wipe clean only Composition: 43% Metal, 43% Rattan, 14% Plywood Self-assembly items cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed, unless they do not comply with the description, are faulty, or are not fit for any stated purpose    This product requires self-assembly. Regrettably, self-assembly items cannot be returned once assembly is part or fully completed, unless they do not comply with the description given, are faulty, or are not fit for any stated purpose. feed.section_title: Because you want 'Wooden Walker for later'

items.name: Pink Wooden Baby Walker with Colourful Blocks

metadata.name: Pink Wooden Baby Walker with Colourful Blocks
metadata.description: You can help your toddler develop confidence on their feet with a Baby Walker. The colourful wooden blocks stimulate a child's senses and motor skills as they fit them into the walker, stack them and feel the different shapes. Plus, the pink design will look wonderful in a nursery.  Lots of wooden blocks to play with  Made from sturdy wood  Develops physical and cognitive skills  Adult assembly required  Child-safe paint  100% Poplar Wood  43 x 27 x 41cm  Suitable from 12 months  Wipe clean only  This product is FSC®-certified. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC) helps to protect forests for all our futures

metadata.name: Woodland Shape Sorter
metadata.description: If you go down to the woods today, what animal shapes will you find? Little tots will have endless fun shape-sorting all their favourite woodland characters into this colourful toy. With a beautifully finished wooden surface, watch little ones count and identify all the shapes and colours. It s a key toy for developing essential hand-eye coordination skills and fine motor skills. The block will also store the shapes, making it a fantastic addition to any nursery or playroom.  Woodland shape sorter  Block also acts as storage  Woodland animals and primary shapes  Develops dexterity and hand-eye coordination  Suitable from 12 months  14x14x14cm  Wipe clean only  This product is FSC® certified. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC) helps to protect forests for all our futures

metadata.name: Woodland Plush Stacker
metadata.description: Woodland friends piled up tall... squeeze, stack and count them all! Build their fine motor skills with an extra dash of fun with this Plush Stacker. With oh so soft materials and ring shapes, it s perfect for little hands to grab, squish and stack, encouraging dexterity, motor skills, and hand-eye coordination, while also teaching colours, numbers, and words. Get ready for some tower-tumbling fun!  Includes soft plush bear, otter, fox, snail and hedgehog stacking toys  Helps develop dexterity and hand-eye coordination  24 x 17 x 22cm  Hand wash only  Suitable from birth

metadata.name: Wooden Toy Camera
metadata.description: Say cheese! Snap away all day with this Wooden Camera Toy. Spark creativity with its colourful design and interactive buttons - it's sure to keep them entertained for hours.  Bright and colourful design  Features a fabric loop handle  Made from durable wood  Suitable for children from 18 months  This product is FSC®-certified. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC) helps to protect forests for all our futures.

metadata.name: Dalmatian Push Along
metadata.description: A fun addition to a polka dot-themed nursery, children will go barking mad for our Dalmatian Push-Along Toy. Perfectly sized for little hands, watch children push the toy along and gain confidence as they walk. With rotating wheels for dog paws, it s a great walking tool and entertaining too!  Classic push-along toy  Wooden handle with extendable end  Dalmatian features wheeled feet that spin  Encourages new walkers  Helps build gross motor skills  Adult assembly required  MAIN: MDF  OTHER: Lotus wood  Wipe clean only  Height: 45cm  Suitable from 12 months  This product is FSC®-certified. The Forest Stewardship Council® (FSC) helps to protect forests for all our futures.
